channel.title: What is a good vps to run for my server?
channel.description:
I am looking to run a vps for my server (EX0TiC Scape) - front page
I have no idea how to run one how to update on one. or which one I should get for about 50-100 people connected.
if you have any ideas or comments please any help at all will help me out with purchasing my first vps.
and thank you all who leave advice or your thoughts!
~Stevo

item.title: What is a good vps to run for my server?
item.dc:creator: @St3vo St3vo
item.description:
@St3vo wrote:

Appreciate the help any other thoughts?

Read full topic
item.source: What is a good vps to run for my server?

item.title: What is a good vps to run for my server?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

You should buy a windows vps since this is your first time. All you do is remote control connect to it with the details the business provides you and transfer your server/client files over and re-download java,no-ip. If your looking for 50 players probably get a 4gb if your looking into 100 players get 8-10gb windows vps.

Read full topic
item.source: What is a good vps to run for my server?
